text:
Very calm, quiet, organised and pleasant full place. Very near to bus interchange, near to food court and all other shops.

We can do all kind of shopping here at place.

I liked it.

There’s a Japanese household section in this huge supermarket called Komonoya Osaka Japan. Everything is still $2
Store staff is helpful & knowledgeable
This place is very convenient. It has sheltered link walkways to the bus interchange, multi storey carpark, hawker centre & heartland shops
Highly recommended

Very wide variety of merchandise available in FP BMC supermarket.
Food outlets include a food centre at BMC sell affordable dishes .

This branch removed the price checker for unknown reason. To make matter worse, so many items are without price label (especially items in the ground floor bread/cake area). How would customers know how much they are paying? Horrible service.

In the south of the island, there are 12 NTUC FairPrices – Alexandra Retail Centre, Telok Blangah St, Depot Heights, Brickworks Estate, Lengkok Bahru, Alexandra View (Artra), Bukit Merah Central, Havelock Rd, Tiong Bahru Plaza, Kim Tian, Silat Ave, and VivoCity Xtra. In my opinion, the best is VivoCity, followed with Bukit Merah Central. Bukit Merah has a few things going for it 1) comprehensive range of products, 2) most times without crowds, 3) convenient parking, 4) Unity pharmacy.
